title: NVIDIA Corp. stock falls Wednesday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       slid 0.58% to $560.53 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around grim trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.56% to 4,739.21 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.25% to 37,266.67. NVIDIA Corp. closed $7.82 short of its 52-week high ($568.35), which the company reached on January 16th. Trading volume (47.2 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 41.9 M.
